Room.Name: Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: The dark hallway runs east and west underneath the giant glacier.
Room.LongDescription: Light reaches this part of the hallway, but just barely. You can see the massive block of ice above you, but there's no way of telling just how far the ice extends and exactly how far underground you are. As you head further to the east, you can see the darkness setting in as you head into the rocks under the glacier.
